nodes.text: The Kafiri Mountains were a mountain range on the planet Khorm, known for its treacherous passages and difficult terrain. During the Clone Wars, the Confederacy of Independent Systems placed an agrocite processing facility in the mountains under the stewardship of the Khormai Warlord Unger Gout, who protected it with a weather-control station. Galactic Republic forces eventually reached the factory and liberated its enslaved Khormai workers.
